meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Victor Saymo Brian Roberts Buzzy Cohen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7307.

td.p: Victor Saymo, an aspiring writer and poet from Keaau, Hawaii
Brian Roberts, an economist from Arlington, Virginia
Buzzy Cohen, a music executive from Los Angeles, California (whose 6-day cash winnings total $121,202)

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Buzzy] You\'re gonna pursue this theme as long as you\'re the champ, aren\'t you?)
[Buzzy nods smilingly]
BrianWho is Jefferson Davis
$1,001
VictorWho is J. Dav DavIis Beauregard?
$5,000
BuzzyWho is You aren\'t rid of me yet Trebek?
$0
Jefferson Davis')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'He died in New Orleans on December 6, 1889, a little over 20 years after his treason case had been dropped')

tr.td: He died in New Orleans on December 6, 1889, a little over 20 years after his treason case had been dropped

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
